featured.text: When night falls over the Red Sea, tiny flashlight fish rise to the surface for food, each with a pair of “headlamps,” one beneath each eye.

definition.zh_def: 頭燈，一種可佩戴在頭部的燈具，通常用於照明。
definition.en_def: A headlamp is a light source worn on the head, typically used for illumination.
definition.example: He wore a headlamp while hiking in the dark.
